member.name: T:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer
member.summary: Initialize ArcObjects runtime environment for this application

member.name: E:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.ResolveBindingEvent
member.summary: Raised when ArcGIS runtime binding hasn't been established.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.InitializeApplication(ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.esriLicenseProductCode[],ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.esriLicenseExtensionCode[])
member.summary: Initialize the application with the specified product and extension license code.
member.remarks: Make sure an active ArcGIS runtime has been bound before license initialization.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.LicenseMessage
member.summary: A summary of the status of product and extensions initialization.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.ShutdownApplication
member.summary: Shuts down AoInitialize object and check back in extensions to ensure any ESRI libraries that have been used are unloaded in the correct order.
member.remarks: Once Shutdown has been called, you cannot re-initialize the product license and should not make any ArcObjects call.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.IsExtensionCheckedOut(ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.esriLicenseExtensionCode)
member.summary: Indicates if the extension is currently checked out.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.AddExtensions(ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.esriLicenseExtensionCode[])
member.summary: Set the extension(s) to be checked out for your ArcObjects code.

member.name: M:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.RemoveExtensions(ESRI.ArcGIS.esriSystem.esriLicenseExtensionCode[])
member.summary: Check in extension(s) when no longer needed.

member.name: P:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.InitializeLowerProductFirst
member.summary: Get/Set the ordering of product code checking. If true, check from lowest to highest license. True by default.

member.name: P:CreateSOMResultRaster.LicenseInitializer.InitializedProduct
member.summary: Retrieves the product code initialized in the ArcObjects application
